control.name: imageComboBoxEdit1
control.description: This image combo box allows you to select how master-detail expand buttons are painted.

control.name: checkEdit1
control.description: This check box controls whether a detail tooltip is displayed when pointing to a master row's expand button.

control.name: checkEdit2
control.description: This check box controls the visibility of detail tabs. Detail tabs are displayed only when the view has several details. They enable end users to switch to a detail view by clicking the corresponding tab.
